programme.title: Space Channel AFTER DARK
programme.desc: A guided tour across the universe on a space ship made of art and sound. Duration: 14400

programme.title: Day Breaking News
programme.desc: From hotels to orbiting "reefs," the foundations for a burgeoning off-world economy are well underway. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Day Breaking News
programme.desc: The stories we're covering today, that will affect our lives tomorrow. Deep Space Technologies, the SCOUT mission, Cosmic Shielding and more... Duration: 3600

programme.title: TrailerPalooza
programme.desc: There are just some space movie trailers that are superior, satisfying and SICK!!!!! Here's a few of our favorites Duration: 3600

programme.title: Cosmic Vibrations
programme.desc: A musical and visual celebration of our connection with our home planet and the universe. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Offshore Space Ports
programme.desc: SpaceX has purchased two offshore oil rigs for $3 Million each, while India is looking for their own Elon Musk to kickstart ISRO's efforts in commercialization of space. Duration: 1800

programme.title: All Hans on Deck!
programme.desc: Tom Brady hates our Moon...but Mars is a completely different story. From cosmic cosmology to Musk See TV, we scroll through our galactic web of fascinating featurettes from everyone we follow. Oh and Astronomy VS Astrology! Duration: 1800

programme.title: The Ultimate Penthouse
programme.desc: Space Tourist takes us out of this world to a company making plans to build a hotel in space as well as those closer to home. Duration: 1800

programme.title: Gravity
programme.desc: From an undisclosed bunker, Space Channel receives transmissions from our connections in deep space (and deep state). Duration: 1800

programme.title: GRAVITY
programme.desc: From an undisclosed location, Agent Roy drops more exclusive video from Professor Avi Loeb and Arik Kershenbaum about life, and living in the Universe Duration: 1800

programme.title: Green Space
programme.desc: Solving problems in space could be the answer to saving Earth. Duration: 3600

programme.title: TrailerPalooza
programme.desc: Our favorite space movies from the big screen to streaming, must see films for your inner space nerd. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Caronte
programme.desc: A Piercing Battle in Space happening in the multiverse of consciousness. Duration: 1800

programme.title: Sky Fighter
programme.desc: Hundreds of years from now, computers are controlling everything...even people. In a Universe where everything can hacked, how can you trust yourself? Duration: 1800

programme.title: Capricorn ONE
programme.desc: When the first manned flight to Mars is deemed unsafe and scrubbed on the launch pad, anxious authorities must scramble to retain their funding - and so an unthinkable plot to fake the mission is hatched. Duration: 9000

programme.title: Space Channel AFTER DARK
programme.desc: When the sun goes down, Space Channel turns on as the Universe comes alive in a melodic mixtape curated for night owls. Duration: 14400
